author: andy
msg: Promote Fuseki2 to trunk

author: stsp
msg: Make svnpredumpfilter.py detect copies of copies (of copies...)
and include them in the set of required paths.
* tools/server-side/svnpredumpfilter.py
(DependencyTracker.__init__): Use sets instead of lists to store
the sets of included paths and dependent paths.
(DependencyTracker.path_incldued): Use union of sets instead of
list concatenation.
(DependencyTracker.handle_changes): Rename to ...
(DependencyTracker.include_missing_copies): ... this, and repeatedly
cross-check all included and dependent paths with all copies to find
more dependent paths to add until no more relevant copies can be found.
(svn_log_stream_get_dependencies): Handle rename of method.

author: stsp
msg: * tools/server-side/svnpredumpfilter.py
(sanitize_path): Use string.startswith() to match the path
against a prefix, rather than string.find(prefix) == 0 which
will try to locate the prefix at any position in the string.

author: rombert
msg: SLING-3956 - [windows] Serialization files are not taken into account
for folders
Paths returned from serializationManager.getSerializationFilePath are in
OS format, so treat the accordingly.

author: kwright
msg: Tag MCF 1.7.1 RC2
